channel.title: Moving Rushmore Vidcast HD (Apple TV)
channel.itunes:author: Moving Rushmore
channel.description: (in HD) Follow the exploits of a group of guys from Manhattan, KS trying to make a living pursuing their dreams and making an impact too. From the forming of the band to making a record (hopefully) help spread the word about Moving Rushmore.
channel.itunes:subtitle: (in HD) Follow the exploits of a group of guys from Manhattan, KS trying to make a living pursuing their dreams and making an impact too. From the forming of the band to making a record (hopefully) help spread the word about Moving Rushmore.
